pages.title: Magnets
pages.text: $(l)Magnets$() are used to pull items towards the player when equipped. Around a $(l)Demagnetizer$() a magnet is disabled. A Magnet can also be disabled when in the $(l)curio slot Belt$().

When crafted, the Magnet has a level corresponding to the current $(l)Vault Level$() and a number of $(l)repairs$(). The higher the Vault Level, the better Durability, Range, Velocity and Mana Efficiency the Magnet will roll. When the $(l)durability$() of a magnet runs out, it can be repaired with a $(l)Repair Core$() as long as it has repair slots remaining. $(br2)The Magnet can be $(l)upgraded$() in the $(l)Magnet Modification Table.$()
